Tournament.signUpConfirmationText: Are you sure you have time on game dates? This is very important for everyone's experience!

helpModal.title: Help
helpModal.signUpContent: When registering, first-come-first-served applies. So the team that is complete first comes in. Each added member must explicitly agree to participate. After the tournament is complete, it is no longer possible to cancel.
helpModal.gameTimeContent: There are fixed time slots for the games at which they must take place. Please make sure that you actually have time for the game dates. In addition, the games must be completed in the specified time.
helpModal.tournamentProcessContent: At the game dates, the games will appear in your game table. They then have to be played. You can use the chat to exchange ideas with the opposing team and also switch to a video / audio chat of your choice.
helpModal.winnerContent: There is a K-O system. The team that wins gets ahead. The last team won. Basically a team has won if the game is won in the required time. If the time is exceeded, the team that played faster wins! It is generally not intended that this will occur.

Toast.left-tournament-detail: You have canceled your participation in the tournament {tournamentTitle}.
Toast.team-is-fix-detail: Your team {teamTitle} is now complete and scheduled for the tournament {tournamentTitle}.
Toast.team-is-waiting-detail: Your team {teamTitle} is now registered but not yet complete. You are missing a teammate or your teammate has to confirm the registration!
Toast.partner-left-summary: Partner has left the tournament team
Toast.partner-left-detail: Your partner {partner} left your team {teamName} for the tournament {tournamentName}. You are now missing a partner.
Toast.signUp-failed-detail: The tournament {tournamentName} will not take place. Unfortunately not enough participants were found.
Toast.signUpEnded-part-summary: Congratulations on participating in the tournament
Toast.signUpEnded-part-detail: The tournament {tournamentName} will take place with you. Remember to enter the dates in the calendar!
Toast.signUpEnded-noPart-detail: Unfortunately you couldn't get a place in the {tournamentName} tournament. Try again next time.

GameView.socketDisconnectedOverlay: The connection to the server is interrupted. We're trying to reconnect!
GameView.reconnectionFailedDetail: Oh no. There was a problem connecting to the server. Please log in again. Good luck!

Chat.allNoMessagesPlaceholder: Messages can be exchanged with all users here. These are not saved!
Chat.waitingNoMessagesPlaceholder: Here messages can be exchanged with the users in your old waiting room / game. These are not saved and only reach the users in your room / game!

Settings.colorBlindness: Optimizing balls for color blind people:

Instructions.needToTrade: You have to swap a card!
Instructions.needToNarr: You have to pass your cards!
Instructions.needToNarrButton: To do this, press the button
Instructions.narrWaitingFor: They still have to pass on their cards:
Instructions.needToTeufel: You played the devil - play now for {name}!
Instructions.needToDiscard: You have to discard a card!
Instructions.buttonOrOtherCard: Press the button in the middle or choose another card
Instructions.moveOrOtherCard: Move a ball or choose another card
Instructions.remainingSteps: You still have to distribute {steps} steps

Waiting.noRoomsPlaceholder: Unfortunately there are no open waiting rooms yet. Create one and wait for your friends to join!
Waiting.removePlayerConfirmSelf: Are you sure you want to leave this waiting room?
Waiting.removePlayerConfirmOther: Are you sure you want to release a player from the waiting room?
Waiting.switchGameConfirm: Are you sure you want to change the waiting room?

RequestNewPassword.successMsg: You have been sent a new password!

SignUp.passwordTooLong: Password can have a maximum of 20 characters

SignIn.errorMsgEmailLink: Click here for a new one

Login.betaDisclaimer: This game is still under development.

ChangeMail.successMsg: Your email address has been changed successfully
ChangeMail.errorMsgGeneral: Your email address could not be changed. Try again
ChangeMail.errorMsgEmail: This email address is no longer available. Choose another one
ChangeMail.errorMsgPwd: The password was wrong. try again

ChangePassword.passwordTooShort: Password must have at least 6 characters
ChangePassword.passwordTooLong: Password can have a maximum of 20 characters

ChangePassword.errorMsgGeneral: Your password could not be changed. Try again
ChangePassword.errorMsgPwd: The password was wrong. try again

UploadProfilePicture.successMsgUpload: Your profile picture has been uploaded and can now be seen
UploadProfilePicture.errorMsgUpload: There was a problem uploading. Please try again
UploadProfilePicture.successMsgDelete: Your profile picture has been deleted
UploadProfilePicture.errorMsgDelete: There was a problem deleting it. Please try again
UploadProfilePicture.privacyDisclaimer: Attention: This picture can currently be viewed by all registered users!
UploadProfilePicture.croppingDisclaimer: In addition, there is no control element to select the desired screen section. So the picture must already be cropped to fit.

DeleteProfile.confirmPrompt: Attention! The deletion cannot be undone! Do you want to continue
DeleteProfile.errorMsg: That is delete failed. Please try again.
DeleteProfile.successMsg: Your account has been successfully deleted. You will be logged off in a moment.

Profile.mostFrequentExp: Player with whom the most games (including co-op) were played
Profile.bestPlayerExp: Player who achieved the highest win rate as a teammate
Profile.worstPlayerExp: Player who achieved the highest win rate as an opponent
Profile.generosityExp: Share of special cards exchanged in percent
Profile.aggressionExp: Thrown balls divided by thrown plus lost balls
Profile.decisionExp: Average playing time per move converted to a scale of 0-100. Anything faster than 10s leads to a perfect 100. Formula: '100 * min (1, 10 * number of moves / total playing time)'
Profile.resentmentExp: What percentage of the 8 cards are used to suspend
Profile.tIconExp: Stands for a completed team tac game
